item.description:
Helen & Steve of Massachusetts Animal Rights Coalition (MARC) are hosting the Ringling Bros Circus Protest in Worcester again. 

Saturday, October 8th 1:00-3:15pm Worcester DCU Center Foster St. Worcester, MA


If you'd like to join VegWorcester members participating in the MARC protest, meet up at 12:45pm in front of the DCU Center. Many of you have already attended before, but if you haven't, check out the photos from previous events and some info about circus cruetly (links below) It will be a peaceful protest, with sign-holding in front of the building as circus-goers enter the event. MARC will have signs and leaflets to give out, but if you want to make your own effective posters and bring them, thats great! Its a good way to take a stand against cruelty by simply showing up and having a large group, to show people that we don't accept cruelty in our city. Tips-If you are driving, make sure to leave enough extra time to park your car and walk to the event as it will be busy in the area during that time. Familiarize yourself with information about circus cruelty in case anyone has any questions. If you have trouble finding us, call me at 508-247-7444. If you want more info about other circus protests going on this month in MA, email MARC at rayshick@msn.com

 

Information about Circus Cruelty: http://www.ringlingbeatsanimals.com http://www.mercyforanimals.org/circuses.asp http://www.aspca.org/fight-animal-cruelty/circus-cruelty http://www.aspca.org/fight-animal-cruelty/circus-cruelty/animal-free-circuses.aspx http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CyqxpPJ8MP8
http://www.peta.org/issues/animals-in-entertainment/circuses.aspx
item.name: Ringling Bros Circus Protest in Worcester
